user_input:
Task ID: emil_build_hydrogen_tst_workbook
Description: Generate hydrogen demand profiles and export them as TST Excel workbooks for the TYNDP 2026 scenario

Scope: Use the main_demand_processer_v2 function to decompose hydrogen annual demand into hourly profiles if necessary, then invoke the build_tst_workbooks function with carrier="hydrogen" to produce the standard TST Excel workbook. Ensure the workbook conforms to TYNDP 2026 formatting and includes all required sheets and metadata.

Expected Outputs: hydrogen_tst_workbook.xlsx

Input Requirements: hydrogen demand data (annual total or existing profile), carrier identifier set to "hydrogen"

Additional Notes: Emil should verify that the demand data aligns with the TYNDP 2026 scenario assumptions before exporting.
author: Emil
